Embankment............... ... ...l 426,000 c.y. @ .30 127,800

Total—Approach Roadways & Embankments.. . ............................... $279,755



Toll Booths and Administration Building

The cost of toll booths and administration building, as shown below,
includes the cost of furnishings and toll taking equipment to be installed
ready for operation.

Total—Toll Booths and Administration Building. ... ... $60,000

Contingencies

Contingencies, amounting to approximately 49, of cost of Bridge Sub-
structure, have been added to cover unforeseen construction exigencies.

Total—Contingencies. . ...................cco..... $223 ,082

D. Engineering, Architectural, and Other Technical Service Fees

Engineering and architectural fees have been estimated on the basis of
69, of the total construction cost, to which has been added the sum of
$38,000 to cover the surveys and line and grade work required during the
construction period, and the cost of special inspection work, making up the
total estimated engineering cost of $830,000.

E. Legal, Administrative, and Overhead Expenses

Legal, Administrative, and Overhead Expenses are estimated to amount
to $25,000 as shown in Table 72.

Table 72
Legal, Admanistrative, and Overhead Expenses
Special Legal Services during Construetion. ................................ $15,000
Administrative and Overhead Expenses.................................... $10,000

Total Legal, Administrative, and Overhead Expenses........................ $25,000
